18 to 20 weeks and help with any concerns or questions you have; 
• give you your MHHR if you have not already received it.
16 weeks
Ultrasound scan to check the physical development of your baby. (Remember, the main purpose of 
this scan is to check that there are no structural abnormalities.)
18–20	weeks	(anomaly	scan)
Your midwife or doctor should:
• use a tape or undertake an ultrasound 
scan  to measure the size of your uterus
